component.name: Chronomancer
component.summary: Applet for managing timers, reminders, and sleep overrides

description.p: Chronomancer is a simple and elegant applet for managing system timers. It allows users to keep their system awake or set times for suspend, shutdown, and logout.

ul.li: Set timers for system actions such as suspend, shutdown, and logout
Keep the system awake for a specified duration or infinitely
Intuitive user interface for easy timer management
Create multiple timers with custom names and durations
Delete timers when no longer needed

description.p: Chronomancer is a useful utility applet for anyone who frequently schedules system actions.

screenshot.caption: Chronomancer main popup showing power override controls
Stay awake button in action, showing the status in your panel or dock

description.p: Initial Flathub release featuring sleep override controls and instantly scheduling shutdowns, suspends, and logouts.
